g:Label.ui:msg: Provide the settings for the view.

p.ui:msg: The view is always built on top of one or several tables. The view can define a subset of their entities, a subset of their variables or variables derived from their variables.

ui:msg.description: Variables filter information for view creation

p.ui:msg: Some tables are defined for this view (see Data tab). The variables of these tables can be filtered to define the variables view.

li.ui:msg: all: no filter is applied. This allows to define a simple join of tables.

script: the filter can be defined by a script which will be applied on each variable of the tables. This script must return a boolean (i.e. true/false) value. If true is returned, the variable on which the script is executed is part of the variables view.

ui:msg.description: Entity filter information for view creation

p.ui:msg: Some tables are defined for this view (see Data tab). The entities of these tables can be filtered to define the entities view.

li.ui:msg: all: no filter is applied. This allows to define a simple join of tables.

script: the filter can be defined by a script which will be applied on each entity of the tables. This script must return a boolean (i.e. true/false) value. If true is returned, the entity on which the script is executed is part of the entities view.
